title: Backend
description: The backend defines the connection pool with given origin for outgoing connections.

title: OAuth2 AC (Beta)
description:
The beta_oauth2 block lets you configure the oauth2_authorization_url() function and an access
control for an OAuth2 Authorization Code Grant Flow redirect endpoint.
Like all access control types, the beta_oauth2 block is defined in the definitions block and can be referenced in all configuration blocks by its required label.
